title: Which element is called wonder element? - Quora

response.answer_text: I guess the most wonder element is oxygen as initially scientists have taken the mole calculation with 1/12th of oxygen atom but later they changed it as it is a highly reactive metal. The wonder element can also be hydrogen as it only only non metal in table of reactivity and also its atomic no is 1 , mass no is 1, number of nucleus is 0.
